title: Get terms in solr not working
description: To get top words in my Apache Solr instance, I am using "terms" query. When I try it in 100 million of data, the data are fetching after a few minutes, But if the data is 300 million the Solr is not responding. My server memory is 100 GB.

comments.content:
Please raise this question on the user's list at solr-user@lucene.apache.org, see: (http://lucene.apache.org/solr/community.html#mailing-lists-irc) there are a lot more people watching that list who may be able to help. 

If it's determined that this really is a code issue in Solr and not a configuration/usage problem, we can raise a new JIRA or reopen this one.

Terms was never designed to return 100s of millions of terms in a single go.

When you do post to the user's list, please include exactly the query you're using.
comments.author: Erick Erickson

comments.content:
My problem is not 100 millions of terms, but 10 terms of 100 million data document,using the simple term query.

Thank you and best regards.
comments.author: adam rag

comments.content: So far you've told us nothing useful. Please respond on the user's list with the exact query you're using.
comments.author: Erick Erickson
